name: Theodora
description:
'''Lili Théodora Mbangayo Mujinga''' (born 2003), known professionally as '''Theodora''' and also as '''Boss Lady''', is a French-Congolese singer. She began releasing music in 2018 and achieved her breakthrough with the 2024 single  "{{Interlanguage link|Kongolese sous BBL|lt=Kongolese sous BBL|fr|Kongolese sous BBL}}", which went viral on [[TikTok]] and was [[certified diamond]] in France the following year. She has released several [[Extended play|extended plays]] and the mixtapes ''{{Interlanguage link|Bad Boy Lovestory|lt=Bad Boy Lovestory|fr|Bad Boy Lovestory}}'' (2024) and its deluxe version ''{{Interlanguage link|Méga BBL|lt=Méga BBL|fr|Méga BBL}}'' (2025), the latter certified platinum. 

In 2025, Theodora received the Flammes award for Best Female Revelation, appeared at major festivals and events including Les Vieilles Charrues, Cabaret Vert, and [[Fête de l'Humanité]], and was described by ''[[Le Monde]]'' as the "pop phenomenon of the summer". In 2025, ''Billboard France'' ranked her the first most-streamed female francophone artist in France, followed by [[Aya Nakamura]].

In 2026, she is set to be part of the jury on ''[[Rhythm + Flow|Rhythm + Flow France]]'' on [[Netflix]].
